医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
$ 500,000赠款，以增强土著社区的数字医疗保健由于50万美元的赠款，在农村地区患有慢性病的原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民将受益于改善医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/24500000-grant-to-enhance-digital-digital-healthcare-for--indigenous-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/24500000-grant-to-enhance-digital-digital-healthcare-for--indigenous-indigenous-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45c2405b-11e6-4bde-becb-0f397420bbf4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:52:03 -0400 $500,000 grant to enhance digital healthcare for Indigenous communities
影响mRNA疫苗功能的关键细胞机制显示由基础科学研究所（IBS）RNA研究中心主任Kim V. Narry博士领导的一组研究人员发现了一种关键的细胞机制，该机制影响了mRNA疫苗和治疗剂的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/key-cellular-mechanism-aftecting-the-the-function-the-function-of-mrna-vaccines-reveared.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/key-cellular-mechanism-aftercting-the-function-the-function-of-mrna-vaccines-reveared.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A27D81E7-5272-4AFB-88C5-1634ECF2318F Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:50:51 -0400 Key cellular mechanism affecting the function of mRNA vaccines revealed
研究确定了17个中风，痴呆和抑郁症之间共享的可修改风险因素与年龄相关的脑部疾病，例如中风，痴呆症和后期抑郁症是使年龄较大的一部分令人衰弱的部分，但是人们可以通过改变行为和生活方式来降低这些疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-indistifies-17-modifiable-clisk-factors-shared-bet-bet-streos-stroke-stroke-dementia-dementia and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-indistifies-17-modifiable-risk-factors-shared-bet-scornared-bet-setroke-dementia-dementia and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41E766E7-EF2B-4A4F-4A4F-AE28-EC5C5C5BAD6CAB Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:46:10 -0400 Study identifies 17 modifiable risk factors shared between stroke, dementia, and depression
研究揭示了美国成年人中物质使用的复杂模式科罗拉多州安索斯大学医学校园的研究人员的一项研究表明，过去一年中，近五分之一的美国成年人使用了多种药物，这表明，与一次使用一种药物相比，使用物质相当普遍，更复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-complex-patterns-patterns-substance-uses-use-in-in-us-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-complex-patterns-patterns-substance-uses-use-in-in-us-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A78019B-D507-4E14-BA7E-8F51B5ADA682 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:40:59 -0400 Study reveals complex patterns of substance use in U.S. adults
与父亲一起生活增强了青少年关系根据一项新的研究，与父亲一起成长的孩子往往会感觉与他们接近，从而形成牢固的人际关系，这些关系持续到挑战性的青少年时代。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/living-with-fathers-newers-screnthers-actenthens-Adement-Realationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/living-with-fathers-newers-screnthers-actenthens-Adement-Realationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B3CA787A-910C-4AE8-8678-93B11202020771 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:33:23 -0400 Living with fathers strengthens adolescent relationships

升高的FGF-23预测房颤患者的LAAEV和中风风险降低宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。当前的AF管理指南已经引入了护理治疗模型，以加强管理策略。在此首字母缩写中，“ A”表示抗凝治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/elevated-fgf-23-predicts-reduces-laaev-and-laaev-and-stroke-crisk--------- in-patients-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/elevated-fgf-23-predicts-redced-laaev-and-laaev-and-stroke-crisk-ink-in-patients-ingatients-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d55eb12-a86f-4277-8d9d9d-14d0086da5b4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:15:51 -0400 Elevated FGF-23 predicts reduced LAAev and stroke risk in patients with atrial fibrillation
计时仪可以有效地衡量健康和健身根据一项将计步器与更复杂的设备进行比较的研究，基本的计步器可以证明足以测量促进健康的体育活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/pedometers-can-effectility-measure-measure-health-health-fitness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/pedometers-can-fectifecty-measure-measure-health-health-fitness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38573ffb-c0a1-4A92-B4F6-DD76917777F19 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:09:00 -0400 Pedometers can effectively measure health and fitness
新的细菌进化图可能会导致感染的精确治疗首先，深入的细菌进化图可能为开发某些抗生素耐药性感染（例如尿路感染）的精确处理铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-bacterial-evolutionary-map-could-could-lead-to-could-to-precision-wartments-foreatments-for-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-bacterial-evolutionary-map-could-could-could-could-could-could-to-precision-wartersments-treatments-for-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bf9b395-3870-4181-BC30-DCD5967924E1 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:05:08 -0400 New bacterial evolutionary map could lead to precision treatments for infections
